Summary: It was long and narrow. It was very reflective and had a green light on towards the back of it.
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in my room with the light on. i was looking around my room; i noticed the reflection on my window looked different and my dogs were barking. a large, and very soft gree light right outside of my window was distorting the reflection of the light coming from my room in my room. there was an object just outside my window. i could make out the object as a long, slinder object, hovering 5 feet about the ground below the horizon of my window. the green light was solid. the ufo had a red light that was blinking behind it. i observed the object as it moved from left to right slowly going out of my line of sight, but staying close to the ground. i felt overwhelmed and fascinated; watching the object, i felt absolutely no threat. i felt psychic\ghostly type energies eminating from it(this made me feel like i was being watched).
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Spring Hill
There were no other sightings in Spring Hill on or around August 24th 2009
